speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
That’s
               
              the
               
              worst
               
              tidings
               
              that
               
              I
               
              hear
               
              of
               
              yet
              .

speaker: WORCESTER
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              by
               
              my
               
              faith
              ,
               
              that
               
              bears
               
              a
               
              frosty
               
              sound
              .

speaker: HOTSPUR
text:
What
               
              may
               
              the
               
              King’s
               
              whole
               
              battle
               
              reach
               
              unto
              ?

speaker: VERNON
text:
To
               
              thirty
               
              thousand
              .

speaker: HOTSPUR
text:
Forty
               
              let
               
              it
               
              be
              .

speaker: HOTSPUR
text:
My
               
              father
               
              and
               
              Glendower
               
              being
               
              both
               
              away
              ,

speaker: HOTSPUR
text:
The
               
              powers
               
              of
               
              us
               
              may
               
              serve
               
              so
               
              great
               
              a
               
              day
              .

speaker: HOTSPUR
text:
Come
              ,
               
              let
               
              us
               
              take
               
              a
               
              muster
               
              speedily
              .

speaker: HOTSPUR
text:
Doomsday
               
              is
               
              near
              .
               
              Die
               
              all
              ,
               
              die
               
              merrily
              .

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
Talk
               
              not
               
              of
               
              dying
              .
               
              I
               
              am
               
              out
               
              of
               
              fear

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
Of
               
              death
               
              or
               
              death’s
               
              hand
               
              for
               
              this
               
              one
               
              half
               
              year
              .
